description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚中南半岛的社会主义国家，由老挝人民革命党一党专政。首都是万象。
description.en: A socialist state in the Indochinese Peninsula of Southeast Asia, governed by the Lao People's Revolutionary Party as a one-party state. Its capital is Vientiane.

description.zh-cn: 老挝政治人物，现任老挝人民革命党中央委员会总书记、老挝国家主席。
description.en: A Laotian politician, currently serving as the General Secretary of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party Central Committee and the President of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 老挝政治人物，现任老挝人民革命党中央书记处常务书记、国家副主席。
description.en: A Laotian politician, currently serving as the Permanent Secretary of the Secretariat of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and Vice President of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 老挝政治人物，现任老挝国家副主席。
description.en: A Laotian politician, currently serving as the Vice President of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 老挝政治人物，现任老挝政府总理。
description.en: A Laotian politician, currently serving as the Prime Minister of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 老挝政治人物，现任老挝国会主席。
description.en: A Laotian politician, currently serving as the President of the National Assembly of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 老挝人民民主共和国的创建者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

description.zh-cn: 老挝人民民主共和国的立法机关。
description.en: The legislative branch of the government of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

description.zh-cn: 老挝历史上第一个统一国家，由法昂于1353年建立。1707年分裂为三个王国。
description.en: The first unified state in Laotian history, founded by Fa Ngum in 1353. It split into three kingdoms in 1707.

description.zh-cn: 孟苏瓦王子，于1353年统一老挝全境，建立了澜沧王国。
description.en: A prince of Muang Sua who unified the whole territory of Laos in 1353 and founded the kingdom of Lan Xang.

description.zh-cn: 泰国的前称，历史上曾多次与老挝各王国发生战争并长期拥有宗主权。
description.en: The former name of Thailand, which historically had numerous conflicts with and long-term suzerainty over the Laotian kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 越南历史上最后一个封建王朝，曾入侵老挝地区并与暹罗争夺宗主权。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of Vietnam, which invaded the Lao region and competed with Siam for suzerainty.

description.zh-cn: 法暹战争后法国建立的保护国，是法属印度支那的一部分。
description.en: A French protectorate established after the Franco-Siamese War, part of French Indochina.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾在中南半岛建立殖民统治，将老挝纳入其法属印度支那联邦。
description.en: A European country that established colonial rule in the Indochinese Peninsula, incorporating Laos into its French Indochina federation.

description.zh-cn: 法国在中南半岛的殖民地联邦，老挝于1898年被并入。
description.en: A colonial federation of France in the Indochinese Peninsula, to which Laos was incorporated in 1898.

description.zh-cn: 老挝在获得独立后建立的君主立宪制国家，1975年被巴特寮推翻。
description.en: A constitutional monarchy established after Laos gained independence, overthrown by the Pathet Lao in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 老挝的共产主义政治运动和组织，在老挝内战后掌权，建立了老挝人民民主共和国。
description.en: A communist political movement and organization in Laos that came to power after the Laotian Civil War and established the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

description.zh-cn: 16世纪统治缅甸的王朝，曾入侵并使澜沧王国成为其藩属。
description.en: A dynasty that ruled Burma in the 16th century, which invaded and made the Kingdom of Lan Xang its vassal state.

description.zh-cn: 暹罗历史上的一个王朝，曾将老挝三国纳为藩属。
description.en: A kingdom in the history of Siam that made the three Laotian kingdoms its vassals.

description.zh-cn: 澜沧王国分裂后形成的三个王国之一。
description.en: One of the three kingdoms formed after the division of the Lan Xang Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 澜沧王国分裂后形成的三个王国之一。
description.en: One of the three kingdoms formed after the division of the Lan Xang Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 澜沧王国分裂后形成的三个王国之一。
description.en: One of the three kingdoms formed after the division of the Lan Xang Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 万象王国末代国王，曾发动反抗暹罗统治的叛乱。
description.en: The last king of the Kingdom of Vientiane, who led a rebellion against Siamese rule.

description.zh-cn: 由万象国王昭阿努发动的反抗暹罗统治的叛乱。
description.en: A rebellion against Siamese rule led by King Anouvong of Vientiane.

description.zh-cn: 1893年法国与暹罗之间的战争，战后法国在湄公河东岸建立了老挝保护国。
description.en: A war in 1893 between France and Siam, which resulted in the establishment of the French Protectorate of Laos on the east bank of the Mekong.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家。二战期间曾占领法属印度支那，并一度促使老挝独立。
description.en: An East Asian country. During World War II, it occupied French Indochina and briefly facilitated Laotian independence.

nodes.id: 老挝自由民族统一战线

zh-cn: 老挝自由民族统一战线

description.zh-cn: 由佩差拉亲王领导的政治运动，旨在维持二战后老挝的独立，后被法军击溃。
description.en: A political movement led by Prince Phetsarath aimed at maintaining Laos's independence after World War II, later defeated by French forces.

description.zh-cn: 老挝人民民主共和国的主要创建者和首位实际最高领导人，曾任老挝人民革命党总书记和政府总理。
description.en: The main founder and first de facto supreme leader of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, who served as General Secretary of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 老挝自1986年开始推行的经济改革政策，旨在向市场经济转型。
description.en: An economic reform policy initiated by Laos in 1986, aimed at transitioning to a market economy.

description.zh-cn: 老挝的邻国，历史上对老挝有重要影响，在老挝人民民主共和国建立后长期与其保持“特殊团结友好关系”。
description.en: A neighboring country of Laos, historically influential, and has maintained a "special solidarity and friendship" with the Lao PDR since its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 老挝的邻国。两国关系在1979年至1989年间恶化，后恢复正常并发展为全面战略合作伙伴关系。
description.en: A neighboring country of Laos. Relations soured between 1979 and 1989, but later normalized and developed into a comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership.

description.zh-cn: 越南的武装力量。在老挝内战期间曾大力援助巴特寮组织，并在老挝人民民主共和国成立后长期驻军。
description.en: The armed forces of Vietnam. It provided significant assistance to the Pathet Lao during the Laotian Civil War and maintained a long-term military presence in Laos after the establishment of the Lao PDR.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋之一，曾任外交部长。他最终决定将“Laos”的中文译名定为“老挝”。
description.en: One of the founding marshals of the People's Republic of China and former Minister of Foreign Affairs. He made the final decision to standardize the Chinese translation of 'Laos' as '老挝'.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚地区的政府间组织，老挝于1997年7月加入。
description.en: A regional intergovernmental organization in Southeast Asia, which Laos joined in July 1997.

description.zh-cn: 处理国家间贸易规则的全球性国际组织，老挝于2013年加入。
description.en: A global international organization dealing with the rules of trade between nations, which Laos joined in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在促进国际合作的政府间组织。老挝于1955年加入。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization aimed at promoting international co-operation. Laos joined in 1955.

position.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 通伦·西苏里是现任老挝人民革命党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Thongloun Sisoulith is the current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.

description.zh-cn: 通伦·西苏里是现任老挝人民民主共和国主席。
description.en: Thongloun Sisoulith is the current President of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.

description.zh-cn: 宋赛·西潘敦是现任老挝政府总理。
description.en: Sonexay Siphandone is the current Prime Minister of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 赛宋蓬·丰威汉是现任老挝国会主席。
description.en: Saysomphone Phomvihane is the current President of the National Assembly of Laos.

description.zh-cn: 1353年，孟苏瓦王子法昂统一老挝全境，建立澜沧王国。
description.en: In 1353, Prince Fa Ngum of Muang Sua unified the entire territory of Laos and founded the Kingdom of Lan Xang.

description.zh-cn: 1975年，由老挝人民革命党领导的巴特寮推翻了君主制政权。
description.en: In 1975, the Pathet Lao, led by the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, overthrew the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 1975年12月2日，老挝人民革命党在推翻君主制后建立了老挝人民民主共和国。
description.en: On December 2, 1975, the Lao People's Revolutionary Party established the Lao People's Democratic Republic after overthrowing the monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 1575年，缅甸东吁王朝军队入侵并攻占首都，澜沧成为缅甸藩属，直到1591年重获独立。
description.en: In 1575, the army of the Toungoo dynasty of Burma invaded and captured the capital, making Lan Xang a vassal state of Burma until it regained independence in 1591.

description.zh-cn: 1779年，暹罗吞武里王朝将缅人逐出老挝后，琅勃拉邦王国沦为暹罗藩属。
description.en: In 1779, after the Thonburi Kingdom of Siam expelled the Burmese from Laos, the Kingdom of Luang Phrabang became a Siamese vassal.

description.zh-cn: 1779年，暹罗吞武里王朝将缅人逐出老挝后，万象王国沦为暹罗藩属。
description.en: In 1779, after the Thonburi Kingdom of Siam expelled the Burmese from Laos, the Kingdom of Vientiane became a Siamese vassal.

description.zh-cn: 1779年，暹罗吞武里王朝将缅人逐出老挝后，占巴塞王国沦为暹罗藩属。
description.en: In 1779, after the Thonburi Kingdom of Siam expelled the Burmese from Laos, the Kingdom of Champasak became a Siamese vassal.

description.zh-cn: 1826年，万象国王昭阿努发动叛乱，反抗暹罗统治。
description.en: In 1826, King Anouvong of Vientiane launched a rebellion against Siamese rule.

description.zh-cn: 法暹战争后，法国于1893年10月正式成立了老挝保护国。
description.en: After the Franco-Siamese War, France officially established the French Protectorate of Laos in October 1893.

description.zh-cn: 1898年，老挝保护国被并入法属印度支那联邦。
description.en: In 1898, the French Protectorate of Laos was incorporated into the federation of French Indochina.

relationships.target: 老挝自由民族统一战线

description.zh-cn: 1946年，法军击溃了旨在维持老挝独立的“老挝自由民族统一战线”组织。
description.en: In 1946, French forces defeated the Lao Issara movement, which aimed to maintain Laos's independence.

description.zh-cn: 在老挝内战期间，巴特寮组织获得了越南人民军的大力援助。
description.en: During the Laotian Civil War, the Pathet Lao organization received significant assistance from the People's Army of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 老挝人民民主共和国建立后，同越南关系紧密，并在1977年签署《老越友好合作条约》，建立“特殊团结友好关系”。
description.en: After its establishment, the Lao PDR maintained close relations with Vietnam, signing the Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in 1977 to establish a "special solidarity and friendship".

description.zh-cn: 因柬越战争及中越战争，老挝站在越南一边，与中国关系恶化，直到1989年才实现关系正常化。
description.en: Due to the Cambodian-Vietnamese War and the Sino-Vietnamese War, Laos sided with Vietnam, leading to a deterioration in relations with China until normalization in 1989.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，在老挝人民革命党第四次全国代表大会上，时任总书记凯山·丰威汉提出进一步推进市场经济改革，开启了革新开放政策。
description.en: In 1986, at the 4th National Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, then-General Secretary Kaysone Phomvihane proposed further advancing market economy reforms, initiating the Chintanakan Mai policy.

description.zh-cn: 1997年7月，老挝正式加入东南亚国家联盟。
description.en: In July 1997, Laos officially joined the Association of Southeast Asian Nations.

description.zh-cn: 老挝于2013年加入世界贸易组织。
description.en: Laos joined the World Trade Organization in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 陈毅最终决定将该国的中文译名定为“老挝”。
description.en: Chen Yi made the final decision to set the country's Chinese translated name as '老挝' (Lǎowō).

description.zh-cn: 1955年，老挝（当时为老挝王国）加入联合国。1975年12月2日，会员国名称变更为老挝人民民主共和国。
description.en: In 1955, Laos (then the Kingdom of Laos) joined the United Nations. On December 2, 1975, the member state's name was changed to the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
